**1. Wrong overhead in width math** — The `"  "` body prefix adds 2 chars but the old code only subtracted 6 for overhead (list border + separator + detail border). The correct overhead is 8. This meant the panels were 2 chars wider than the terminal, pushing the right edge off-screen and reducing effective content width.

**2. Minimum detail width too small** — The old minimum was 20, but the board preview is 25 chars wide. At any terminal narrower than ~70 cols, `detailWidth` would be clamped to 20 and the board would wrap. Changed to 27 (25 chars board + 2 breathing room).

The split is now 60% list / 40% detail from the available width (after subtracting the correct 8-char overhead), and the detail panel is guaranteed to always be at least 27 chars wide.

132→func (m *Model) View() string {
   133→	th := m.theme
   134→	filtered := m.filtered()
   135→
   136→	header := th.Header.Bar.Width(m.width).Render(" " + th.Header.Title.Render("PUZZLE LIBRARY"))
   137→
   138→	// Overhead: 2 (body "  " prefix) + 2 (list border) + 2 ("  " separator) + 2 (detail border) = 8
   139→	available := m.width - 8
   140→	if available < 1 {
   141→		available = 1
   142→	}
   143→	detailWidth := available * 40 / 100
   144→	if detailWidth < 27 { // board preview is 25 chars wide; need at least 27
   145→		detailWidth = 27
   146→	}
   147→	listWidth := available - detailWidth
   148→	if listWidth < 15 {
   149→		listWidth = 15
   150→	}
   151→
   152→	list := m.renderList(filtered, listWidth)
   153→	detail := m.renderDetail(filtered, detailWidth)
   154→
   155→	panels := lipgloss.JoinHorizontal(lipgloss.Top,
   156→		th.Library.PanelBorder.Width(listWidth).Render(list),
   157→		"  ",
   158→		th.Library.PanelBorder.Width(detailWidth).Render(detail),
   159→	)
   160→
   161→	hints := th.Footer.KeyHint.Render("j/k") + th.Footer.KeyLabel.Render(" Scroll") +
   162→		"   " + th.Footer.KeyHint.Render("Enter") + th.Footer.KeyLabel.Render(" Load") +
   163→		"   " + th.Footer.KeyHint.Render("Esc") + th.Footer.KeyLabel.Render(" Back")
   164→	footer := th.Footer.Bar.Width(m.width).Render("  " + hints)
   165→
   166→	bodyHeight := m.height - 2 - lipgloss.Height(footer)
   167→	body := lipgloss.NewStyle().Height(bodyHeight).PaddingLeft(2).Render(panels)
